mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENTS_NO, C.MEMBER_NO, C.BOARD_NO, C.COMMENTS_CONTENT, C.COMMENTS_CREDATE, C.COMMENTS_UPDATE, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM COMMENTS C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY C.COMMENTS_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS(COMMENTS_NO, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, COMMENTS_CONTENT, COMMENTS_CREDATE, COMMENTS_UPDATE) VALUES (COMMENTS_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{commentsContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
